column1: Little Goat Diner////This place!  If you're looking for a unique (and delicious) brunch spot
column2: I would stop here.  Last time I went in
column3: we got a table outside. I got the parathas burrito and my friend got the this little piggy went to China.  We started with two of the cinnamon rolls
column5: but you might want to split!  They were huge.
